response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $120 for the product. This offer takes into account both the cost of production and the perceived value to you. I believe this is a fair deal that allows us to part ways with the product while ensuring you receive a valuable item at a reasonable price. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
